item.title: Problem with starter!
item.dc:creator: @mige5 mige5
item.description:
@mige5 wrote:

sorry if im a bit stupid but i dont really understand you: where should i add that (public int starter= 0;)?? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 29, 2008, 04:41:15 am[/size][hr]WORKS!!! thx for every1 who tried to help me…

THE PROBLEM WAS: the loading method, it didnt load starter so I only added it there and worked…

LOL, i already thought that the problem is that but then I forgot to check that…

CODE WHAT needed to add: (added in to loading method)
} else if (token.equals(“character-starter”)) {
starter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

try using a diffrent starter
delete that stuff in ur client.java

and paste this where it was

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 100000);

addItem(554, 1000);

savemoreinfo();
savechar();

sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!");

        }

item.title: Problem with starter!
item.dc:creator: @mige5 mige5
item.description:
@mige5 wrote:

so this is my code:

			} else if (NPCID == 200) { /*Lord*/
				if (starter == 0) {
					starter = 1;
					addItem(Item2.randomnoobstuff(), 1);
					teleportToX = 3275;
					teleportToY = 3170;
					sendMessage("Lord gave you the starter stuff.");
					sendMessage("and sent you back to home.");
					savemoreinfo();
				} else {
					sendMessage("You cant do this again.");
				}

WORKS allmost perfectly, but when i logout
I can get the stuff again…
SO i think the server doesnt save that what say that starter have been used…
